description:
Akira and Yukari are the stars of the KiraPâti, but when Ichika sends them out to buy toppings for the perfect fruit tart, their natural differences assert themselves.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yukari tai Akira! Arashi o Yobu Otsukai!
Yukari vs. Akira! The Stormy Shopping Trip!
ゆかりVS[たい]あきら! 嵐を呼ぶおつかい!
